paragraphs: The coffee festival "Barista of the Year" (Barista roku 2022) will take place at the New Town Hall in Prague on March 12 and 13. Within its framework, there will also be a championship among professional baristas for preparing coffee-based cocktails.
Visitors will be able to try coffee from the best Czech coffee roasting factories, watch competitions, and learn a lot of new things at thematic lectures.
Address - Karlovo náměstí 1/23, Prague 2. Time - from 08:00 to 19:00. Tickets can be purchased here.
